abstract: Three people are killed in mortar attack on United Nations base in northern Mali; Islamic extremists, who French forces expelled from urban areas in 2013, are presumed responsible.
lead_paragraph: No one claimed responsibility for the attack, which also wounded 20 people, four of whom were in serious condition, a United Nations spokesman said.

headline.main: Mortar Attack on a U.N. Base in Mali Kills at Least 3
headline.print_headline: Mortar Attack on a U.N. Base Kills 3 in Mali

snippet: No one claimed responsibility for the attack, which also wounded 20 people, four of whom were in serious condition, a United Nations spokesman said.
